backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing session management, user profiles, and access control with admin-gated initialization; includes CRUD operations for chat sessions with messages and files.
backend/migration.mo: Minimal migration module that defines an Actor type with an `isReady` flag and a no-op `run` function that returns the old state unchanged.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the fix for the ActorGuard component getting stuck in a loading state, listing the affected file and related components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-generated JSON summaries of all frontend source files describing their purpose, themes, and key implementation details for build planning reference.
frontend/index.css: Global dark theme CSS defining OKLCH color tokens for an indigo/cyan palette, glassmorphism utilities, glow effects, and font imports for Space Grotesk, Inter, and JetBrains Mono.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point for the Noventra.Ai Vite/React app that mounts the React root and loads the main TSX module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React app component that sets up TanStack Router with session routes, QueryClientProvider, dark ThemeProvider, and wraps everything in ActorGuard to block rendering until the backend is initialized.
frontend/src/components/ActorGuard.tsx: Guard component that checks backend readiness via `getReadyStatus` and `initialize`, treating 'already initialized' and 'Unauthorized' errors as ready states, with a 30-second timeout and retry UI to prevent perpetual loading.
frontend/src/components/CodeBlock.tsx: Mac-style code block component with terminal chrome (traffic light dots), a filename/language label, syntax-highlighted code display in JetBrains Mono, and a clipboard copy button.
frontend/src/components/LivePreview.tsx: Renders an HTML string inside an iframe with viewport size controls (desktop/tablet/mobile), a refresh button, and an open-in-new-tab button using blob URLs.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: A button component that handles Internet Identity login and logout, showing loading state and clearing the React Query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/Logo.tsx: Displays the Noventra.ai brand logo with an animated SVG flame icon and a styled wordmark, supporting small and large size variants.
frontend/src/components/MessageBubble.ts: Renders a chat message bubble that parses content into text and fenced code blocks, and shows a live preview button when the message contains an HTML code block.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: A modal overlay form that prompts a newly authenticated user to enter their name and saves it via the useSaveCallerUserProfile mutation.
frontend/src/components/ShareButton.tsx: A button that copies the current page URL to the clipboard and shows a toast notification with a temporary 'Copied!' state.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A React Query hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor based on the current Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and hook using DFINITY's AuthClient, exposing login/logout functions, identity state, and login status.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend actor interactions including user profile CRUD, session management (get/create/delete), and message/file mutations with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet importing Google Fonts and Tailwind, defining CSS custom properties for the dark theme color system, and utility component classes like glass, glow, gradient-text, and button styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/ChatPage.tsx: Chat interface page that loads a session, sends user messages to an LLM, extracts generated HTML, persists messages and files to the backend, and displays a live preview alongside the conversation.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Marketing landing page showcasing features, stats, and CTAs with a hero section, feature grid, and authentication-aware navigation to start a new session.
frontend/src/pages/NewSessionPage.tsx: Form page for creating a new project session, allowing the user to enter a name and select a project type (landing, fullstack, mobile, API) before navigating to the chat page.
frontend/src/pages/SessionsPage.tsx: Displays a list of user sessions as cards with project type icons, timestamps, and message counts, supporting navigation to individual sessions and deletion with loading/error states.
frontend/src/services/llmService.ts: Provides AI response generation via OpenRouter API, building system prompts per project type and handling both initial generation and modification of existing HTML applications.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting URL parameters from query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage persistence helpers and hash cleanup functionality.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining a dark-themed design system with custom oklch colors, brand/cyan palettes, glass shadows, and animations like flame-flicker and pulse-glow.
project_state.json: Tracks project state at version 3, recording a known issue where the app gets stuck on a 'system not ready yet' message and listing a pending backend fix request for actor initialization logic.
